title: Rebelz Games Introduces a Game Changer in Beer Pong Culture
text:
Rebelz Games
ROTTERDAM, Netherlands , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Rebelz Games, a Dutch board game developer is about to revolutionize the beer pong industry with their new game " MadPong . The best thing since beer pong!" An insane version of the best sold drinking game in America. The launch of the product will be done through a crowdfunding campaign at Kickstarter.com on November 3, 2015 .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151022/279581-INFO
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151022/279582
The company already has a couple of successful games under its belt, with the most successful being MadWish, a crazy truth or dare game with the addition of shots. MadWish was also a big inspiration in the creation of MadPong. According to Rebelz Games and its founder B端lent Yildiz, Madpong brings joy & excitement back into the game. "We believe that with the creation of MadPong we were able to bring more color into the game. The interaction level in MadPong between players is very high," says the creator of the game B端lent Yildiz.
The thing that makes MadPong different and funnier than regular beer pong is its assignments. Also, we added shot glasses in the game to bring more variation. MadPong has up to 63 different waterproof assignments cards that can be placed inside the cups. If the ball falls into your cup, you drink the beer first and then perform the assignment. Everyone has to follow your lead, the last one who follows has to take a shot. This way, the other players in the room will also have more engagement during the game.
Super crazy
MadPong has been tested on multiple occasions and also at a college party with a tournament. B端lent Yildiz: "The reaction was incredible and resulted in hilarious situations. People literally fell over each other from laughter. This reaction comes mainly from the original assignments but also from the extra shots. We purposely designed these assignments cards with images instead of text, this way it's easy for everyone to understand even if you're drunk. These assignments vary from twerking to touching the fattest person in the room. Some of the assignments are on the edge or just over the edge from what people find socially acceptable. If people find the game going too far, then we have achieved our goal. We are the Rebelz, that's our mission."
Clean beer
MadPong is not only more fun to play but also more hygienic. The assignment is printed on a waterproof card which can be placed on the edge inside of the special designed shape of the King's Cup. This way the ball remains separated from the beer which is underneath the assignment card. During Beer Pong, hair, dust and other filth sticks to the ball and ends up in your beer. Rebelz Games: "We found this to be the biggest problem with beer pong. Now that the problem is solved! Are you ready for FULL MADNESS?."
